note.p: Gardener and missionary. Married Clara Martin in Worcester in 1869. Assistant to the missionary Thomas Bridges in Ushuaia, Tierra del Fuego. Lived in Ushuaia, 1895. Started the Estancia Remolino outside Ushuaia on the Beagle Channel in 1899. Conducted baptisms at the Anglican mission in Ushuaia until at least 1923.
